t: Testing AWS Lambda functions written in Java | AWS Open Source Blog
s: February 6, 2024 - Testing is an essential task when building software. Testing helps improve software quality by finding bugs before they reach production. The sooner we know there is a defect in code, the easier and cheaper it is to correct. Automated tests are a central piece in reducing this feedback loop.
